name: Julia
title: The Nature's Guardian
subtitle: A protector who harnesses the power of nature to support her allies
lore: A skilled warrior who has dedicated her life to protecting nature and its inhabitants. Julia uses her connection to the spiritual world to heal and empower her allies while using the forces of nature to control the battlefield. Her deep understanding of natural and spiritual energies makes her an invaluable support to any team.

passive.name: Spiritual Aura
passive.description: Every nearby teammate receives a bonus [2/4/6/8/10] HP Regen. Allies affected by Julia's abilities receive 50% of the HP Regen bonus for 3s.

Q.name: Windblower
Q.description: Julia blows the wind in the designated direction, healing the hit teammates and herself for [90/275/450/630/800/900] and increasing their movement speed by [35%] for [2s].

W.name: Building Nature
W.description: Julia plants a seed in the designated location, which provides vision and if an enemy steps on it, they are rooted for [1s] and take [10%] increased damage while under the effect. Maximum of 3 seeds can be placed. The seed lasts for [80s].

E.name: Knockback attack
E.description: Julia knocks back every hit enemy in the designated direction and deals [70/105/225/300/375/400] damage. If the target hits a wall, they are stunned for [1s]. The knockback interrupts any jump.

R.name: Strength of Spirits
R.description: Every living teammate is instantly healed for [20%/25%/35%] of their maximum HP.

1.name: Enhanced Regeneration
1.description: Passive healing regen increases by [1.5] unit at each specified level.

1.name: Enhanced Saplings
1.description: W saplings root for [0.5s] longer and provide greater vision.

1.name: Wind Speed
1.description: After Windblower, Julia moves [10%] faster for [2s].

5.name: Attack Quest
5.description: QUEST: Autoattack enemy champions 50 times -> Gain bonus [30%] AD.

5.name: Wall Impact
5.description: If E ability knocks an enemy into a wall, they take additional [50/70/90/105/125] damage.

10.name: Healing Boost
10.description: Increases healing received by all affected allies by [10%] for 6s.

10.name: Cleansing Spirit
10.description: Removes all CC from all affected allies.

15.name: Enhanced Wind
15.description: Increases the width and length of Q ability and reduces its cooldown by 1s.

15.name: Magic Shield
15.description: All allies healed by Q ability and Julia gain a [20%] magic shield for [5s].

15.name: Protective Wind
15.description: All allies healed by Q ability gain [5%] damage reduction for [1.5s].

20.name: Full Recovery
20.description: R ability heals all allies to [85%] health.

20.name: Nature's Mastery
20.description: Reduces the cooldown of all Julia's abilities by 1s and allows her to place 5 saplings instead of 3.

20.name: Devastating Impact
20.description: Knockback attack does not deal damage, but if the enemy hits a wall, they take massive damage [1000/2000].

20.name: Vision Denial
20.description: Building Nature sapling disables vision granted by the rooted target for 2s.
